# Introduction

In this article, we present an adapted version of the R Statistical Software (@RSoftware) package RespChamberFlux (@RespChamberProc) to use with the PICARRO (REF) system.

# Methodology
All calculations were done using R Statistical Software version `r paste(version$major,version$minor,sep=".")` (@RSoftware) .
